de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Interface DistanceFunction<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClusteringDistanceSimilarityFunction, DBIDDistanceFunction, DBIDRangeDistanceFunction, DimensionSelectingSubspaceDistanceFunction<O>, IndexBasedDistanceFunction<O>, Norm<O>, NumberVectorDistanceFunction<O>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O>, SpatialPrimitiveDistanceFunction<V>, WeightedNumberVectorDistanceFunction<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsolutePearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, AbsoluteUncenteredCorrelationDistanceFunction, AbstractDatabaseDistanceFunction, AbstractDBIDRangeDistanceFunction, WeightedMaximumDistanceFunction, WeightedPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction

    public interface DistanceFunction<O>
    Base interface for any kind of distances.
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Detail

      • isSymmetric

        boolean isSymmetric()
        Is this function symmetric?
        Returns:
        true when symmetric

      • isMetric

        boolean isMetric()
        Is this distance function metric (in particular, does it satisfy the triangle equation?)
        Returns:
        true when metric.
